title: Secure Authentication and Multi-Factor Access Control
summary: Implement secure login and multi-factor authentication for safe access.
description: Develop a secure authentication system enabling customers to log in using multi-factor authentication (MFA). Incorporate data encryption, secure session handling, and industry-compliant password policies. Ensure that users’ identities are verified through an additional factor, such as OTP or biometric verification, providing strong protection against unauthorized access.

title: Responsive and Accessible User Interface
summary: Create a responsive, accessible, and modern web interface adaptable to all devices.
description: Design and implement a responsive front-end interface that adapts seamlessly across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Ensure compliance with accessibility standards and usability best practices, allowing customers to easily navigate and perform tasks with minimal effort while maintaining a consistent and intuitive look and feel.

title: Personalized Dashboard Experience
summary: Develop a dynamic dashboard showing personalized banking products and actions.
description: Create a data-driven dashboard that displays information tailored to each user’s profile and eligibility. Present account summaries, recommended services, and important alerts in a unified view. Include shortcuts to frequently used features, adaptive components based on user behavior, and real-time updates for enhanced user engagement.

title: Digital Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
summary: Enable users to open accounts and submit service modification requests digitally.
description: Implement guided workflows allowing customers to submit new account openings, product enrollments, and service modifications online. Design an intuitive step-by-step process to capture required information with minimal clicks. Ensure validations, workflow routing, and approval checkpoints adhere to regulatory and operational standards.

title: Real-Time Notifications and Email Updates
summary: Provide real-time status tracking, in-app, and email notifications for user requests.
description: Develop a notification system that provides real-time status updates for all user-initiated requests. Integrate email and in-portal alerts for key workflow events such as submission, approval, or rejection. This feature ensures transparency and enhances user engagement by keeping customers informed at all stages.

title: Document Upload and Verification System
summary: Enable secure uploading and management of required documents.
description: Develop a secure document upload feature allowing users to attach supporting files for account openings and service requests. Validate file formats, enforce encryption at rest and in transit, and associate uploaded documents with customer records. Provide a document viewer for both users and administrative reviewers.

title: Save and Resume Applications
summary: Allow users to save incomplete workflows and resume them later.
description: Implement a save-and-resume capability enabling customers to temporarily save incomplete forms or service requests. On returning, users should seamlessly pick up from where they left off. This function should support progress indicators, time-based auto-save, and robust session management without compromising security.

title: User Interaction History and Audit Logs
summary: Maintain a full history of user actions and request activities.
description: Develop an audit logging mechanism to track and store all customer interactions, including submissions, logins, and modifications. The feature should present users with their request histories, ensuring transparency and supporting regulatory audit requirements. Logs must be tamper-proof and secured under compliance standards.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate the portal with the bank’s core systems for real-time data access.
description: Build an integration layer connecting the self-service portal to the existing core banking system through secure APIs or middleware. Enable synchronization of account data, transaction statuses, and customer information in real time. The integration must ensure consistency, fault tolerance, and strict access security.

title: Dedicated Portal Database and Optimization Layer
summary: Maintain a separate database to ensure performance and system independence.
description: Implement a dedicated database layer optimized for portal performance, ensuring quick response times and minimal load on the core banking infrastructure. Include caching, indexing, and asynchronous data synchronization mechanisms to improve reliability and throughput while adhering to security and compliance requirements.

title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
summary: Restrict portal access according to user roles and authorization levels.
description: Introduce a role-based access control framework that assigns permissions and service access depending on each user’s profile. Define clear authorization hierarchies and ensure compliance with banking security standards. Prevent unauthorized data exposure and restrict workflows only to permitted user categories.
